name: Sid
text: Welcome to the Honeybee Inn stranger!

name: Lorenz
text: Hello, do you know where I can find some ship parts? My ship crash landed here and I need to fix it.

name: Sid
text: Oh, yes, I do actually. You should talk to Phil. He's the local salvager.

name: Sid
text: You'll find him around the junk yard tunnel to your left after you leave the Inn.
